page.title: 18 My Life in Wolverhampton
page.content: In my spare time I go to my friends. We either play cards or make camps.On Wed- nesdays and Thursdays I go Asda to spend my mom and dad's or uncle's money.If I stop in I spend my time eat- ing lots of beefburgers,icecream,bacon, sausages and pizzas. If it is raining I go out and get wet or play my records. If Mark comes round we get the bricks and make army bases. On Friday,Saturday and Sunday I go to the club with my mom and dad to play bingo. I don't really like it but it gets me out the house. Sometimes I sneak in a club over the road and get kicked out about 10.30pm. Some nights I go on the CB radio to eyeball people. The next night I go to where I said I would eyeball them and talk to them.The last eyeball I had was to meet a boy at the Red Lion.Sometimes I go swimming at Bushbury or Swancote Baths.I often stop all day at the baths
